title: Grossglockner Inc. Recalls Pork Products Due To Misbranding
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 3, 2016 Grossglockner Inc., a Canandaigua, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 204 pounds of fully cooked, not shelf stable, pork sausage banger products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today...
